subject: TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm Pt
body:
CNN.com - Showbiz Tonight










TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm
Pt

THE ROSIE FIRESTORM!
The
unbelievable, raging firestorm over Rosie O'Donnell and
Elisabeth Hasselbeck's feud on 'The View'!Did it get way
too
personal? Who crossed the line? And we've just gotta
ask: Has
Rosie become too hot to handle?Tonight,Showbiz
Tonight asks the
tough questions about the *shoutfest*
heard 'round the world on
TV's most provocative
entertainment news show!

DIRTY DIVORCES!

X- rated star divorces!Tonight the startling pornography
claims as Anne Heche's divorce gets really dirty!And we do
mean
dirty.And it's not the first time porn has come up in
a star
divorce! Tonight, Showbiz Tonight uncovers the dirty
little
secret that could be ruining celebrity marriages!

WHAT MAKES AN AMERICAN IDOL?
As Jordin
Sparks is crowned the new American Idol, Showbiz
Tonight
reveals that in the music industry, women up-and-comers
will get nowhere fast unless they are good looking. Sorry,
plain Janes need not apply!


SHOWBIZ
TONIGHT QUESTION OF THE DAY
Rosie O'Donnell vs.
Elisabeth Hasselbeck: Did "The View" feud
get too personal?
